title: IS CIE Course worth?
content: Planning to take up CIE course.. which holds 2 credits and duration is 5 months.. any senior who has completed it please share your experience!

comments.body:
Hey, Iâ€™ve completed both levels and also won the overall best team award last sem(little brag ðŸ˜‚). 

I really suggest you take it up! Itâ€™s worth every second and youâ€™ll get to be part of very positive atmosphere. 

Sathya sir and Madhukar sir are excellent mentors. 

DM me if you want any specifics. But all in all, take it up, donâ€™t miss the opportunity.

Even if you don't want to take the course, I would highly recommend being involved with the activities the CIE does. Being involved with projects that were offered through them opened a lot of doors, and IMO, is what kickstarted my career.
